mapper.select: select p.province_code as `provinceCode`, ci.city_code as `cityCode`, a.area_code as `areaCode`, s.street_code as `streetCode`, co.`id` as `id` from `community` co left join `street` s on s.`street_code` = co.`street_code` left join `area` a on a.`area_code` = s.`area_code` left join `city` ci on ci.`city_code` = a.`city_code` left join `province` p on p.`province_code` = ci.`province_code` where co.`id` = #{id}

select p.name as `provinceName`, ci.name as `cityName`, a.name as `areaName`, s.name as `streetName`, co.`id` as `id` from `community` co left join `street` s on s.`street_code` = co.`street_code` left join `area` a on a.`area_code` = s.`area_code` left join `city` ci on ci.`city_code` = a.`city_code` left join `province` p on p.`province_code` = ci.`province_code` where co.`id` = #{id}
